attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2021-0226

Date: 2021-03-26

Whereas the Spruce Grove and District Chamber of Commerce, in Alberta, whose certificate of formation was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on May 12, 1981, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Administrator of the Government of Canada in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves the Spruce Grove and District Chamber of Commerce.


 

Attendu que la Spruce Grove and District Chamber of Commerce (Alberta), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 12 mai 1981, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence l’administrateur du gouvernement du Canada en conseil dissout la Spruce Grove and District Chamber of Commerce.
